"What?Never seen a cat saber before?"She asked.Cat saber?What the heck where those?

(If you really want to know,what a cat saber is,go to the Disgaea wiki.Don't worry,it's not a light saber in the shape of a cat.)

"Master...we got him."The leader said,as she suddenly yanked our hero forward.Our hero looked up,seeing that the cat girls master was...
11331.title: Framed and flamed...

113311.content:
Our hero was soon facing a Beast master,one of the most known tamers of demons.

"Don't you think everyone know that already?"The Beast master said,raising an eyebrow at the narrator.

I thought it would be a proper introduction.

"Whatever..."She said,as she took a look at our hero.This Beast master had very big and spiky red hair,with constant white stripes on it.This hair looks like it could cover our hero's head.This girl's clothes looks part armor,part hillbilly clothes...and a tail trailed behind her.He can't tell if it's real or not.

"Good job,catching the thief,ladies."The cat ladies bowed their heads.

"Now,as for you...where are their clothes?"She said,placing a finger on our hero's chin.Our hero shaked his head,shaking off the Beast master's finger.

"MMPH!!"Our hero screamed,probably protesting.

Looks like the Beast master forgot about the tape.

"I see that now..."The Beast master,ripped the tape off of our hero,leaving a red trail across his face,probably where his face is hurting.

"Yewouch!"He yelled in pain.Everyone seemed to ignore it however.

"Now,i'm going to ask again...where are the Kit cat girl's clothes?"She said,crossing her arms.

"I-don't-know-where-they-are-I-was-framed-for-someone-else!!"Our hero furiously yelled,jumping in place with every word,despite him being tied up.

"Ah-ah-ahhh...it's not wise to start getting angry with me.You remember,what happened the last time,right?"She said,as she had drawn out...a razor sharp sword,that was almost twice the body side she was.How was she able to carry that thing!?All the cat girls behind him,where trying their bast not to laugh.Our hero wanted to say no...but she may 'remind him'.

"Look...who is this guy you're looking for,anyhow?"He asked.

"You,of course!You obviously changed clothes,so that we couldn't find you,but what you didn't know,it that the Kit cat girls have very acute senses,and could smell you 20 miles away."

"Wait a minute..."You started,but she raised her sword high above her head.

"Enough!Tell me where the clothes are or--"

Right when the Beast master was about to execute him,a cat saber busted into the room.

"Aw..."

"Master Sati!Master Sati,i've got something for you!"The Cat Saber yelled,as she ran in front of Master Sait and held a picture in from of her.

"What now!?"Sati said,as she yanked the picture from the Cat Saber claws.

"It's the picture of the thief you've been looking for...I saw him snatching some foods,and I took a picture,before he got away."The cat saber said.Sati had a confused look on her face,turning towards the picture,than our hero,then at the picture again.

"Wha...bu...I...girls,item store,NOW!!"Sati yelled,as she ran straight though the group,which followed her shortly,straight out the door.Our hero sighed in relief,but soon noticed that the Cat saber was still there.

"Uh...shouldn't you have gone with the group?"The hero said,raising an eyebrow.It makes sense for a group of cat girls to go together,right?The hero had noticed how the Cat sabers were only half his height...standing on his own two feet,of course...

"Why...so you could stay here,and get bored.No way."The cat saber said.That's a very good point...if the Cat saber had left,you would have been stranded here.

"Right...are you gonna untie me?"Our hero asked.

"Why do you think,I stayed behind?Meow!"The Cat saber said,as she quickly swiped her razor sharp claws across the rope lines,making them break and scatter around his feet.

And with that...the friendship grew stronger between our hero and the Cat saber,a boy and a monster,a--

"Alright,we get it,just shut up!"
113311.title: A Spikey red head...(Beast master)

1133111.content:
Our hero and friend are now near the item shop,where the Cat Saber said that she saw the thief.

"Not only that,I could get mauled again..."Said our hero,as he started to take note that the cat girls,where on constant patrol.Luckily,they all got their clothes back...sadly,they didn't find the thief.If they don't find this guy soon,our Hero may find a quick end.

"I wonder where,he could be."The Cat saber said,as she looked under a tiny pebble.

"He couldn't have gotten too far.Maybe he saw you,then decided to hide somewhere.A place no one expects."Our hero suggested,rubbing a finger his chin.

"Where no one expects,eh?"Said a voice,which our hero quickly turned to the top of the shop.

Not only was the voice female,the body was female too.This girl basically had an hourglass figure,with round hips,and C-cup breasts,covered by a red bra,but the bra looks like it can snap at any moment.She was also wearing a hat,with two holes in it,and it had stitches near the bottom.The stitches were in a curve,that looks like a smile.

"You remind me,when I was younger."She giggled,as she slowly swayed her legs.She was sitting on the roof.

"Uh...that's a weird way to introduce yourself."Our hero said.Despite her rather large size,she was able to front flip of the roof,and land in front of our hero,with out even toppling over.

"Well,excuse me.How do you want me to introduce myself,Mr.I-know-how-to-greet-people."She said,as she crossed her arms and turned her head away.

"Sorry...but,besides that,what are you doing here?"He asked.

"I overheard about you being framed,for my rival's doing.The name's Shelly,by the way."She said,wagging her finger,but she still had her head turned away.She even had her eyes closed.

"Rival...at least you didn't confuse me,for your rival...so that's good..."He said,relived.The girl but on a nervous smile.

"Well..."She started,rubbing a hand behind her head.

"Don't say it."

"I found him!Yes!"Our hero,and the girl had turn all of their attention to the Cat Saber...who was playing with a yarn ball.

"Uh...that's a yarn ball."Our hero said.The Cat Saber stopped playing the ball,and started to hug her yarn ball.

"It's not just a Yarn ball...it's Mr.Yarny."

That will explain the 'him' part.

"So...anyways,who's your rival?"The hero asked,which Shelly shoved a picture into our hero's chest.He quickly took the picture,and examined what was on it.

Apparently,this guy did look like our hero.Pale skin,blue pants,brown pants,blonde hair,and a blue shirt.The only thing different about this guy,was that he was wearing the same hat,except his was blue,plus he was wearing a cape,and there was a noticeable pocket along his belt.It looks like a gun was sticking out of it.

"Great...not only is this guy ironic,but he's dangerous,too."Our hero said,as he face turned into a giant frown.

"He's not that strong,if you ask me."Shelly said,as she took the picture back.

"Why do you need to be strong?A gun could instantly kill us."

"Only if you're weak enough.For me,however,I have one too."She said,as she pulled out a red a purple striped gun,that looked too heavy for one hand.However,she was holding it with one hand.

Our hero was shocked,when he was told of something unreal.

"Okay,stop calling me the hero!My name is Kyle!Get it right!"

Okay,okay...jeez.

"Anyways,do you know where your rival could be?"Kyle asked.

"I know exactly where,he could be!Why would you ask such a question,about my ultimate rival,when I am sworn to defeat him,wh--"

"Yeah,yeah,yeah...let's just go already!"Kyle shouted...but then realized something...how is he suppose to go against someone,who has a gun.

"Wait...I need something to defend myself against him..."

"Ah...you're quick to catch on...hey,you!Yemen!"She quickly called out,which the Cat Saber quickly stood in front of Kyle.

"It's gun time!Nya~!"Yemen said,as she sprang up into the air...and didn't seem to return...but then she came crashing onto the ground,but her body looked completely stoned,and she was holding a yellow tube of some sort.

"Whoa...this is cool...but at the same time strange..."Kyle said,as he examined his newly developed friend,turning a flipping her.He soon found a little chipped of piece,below the yellow tube,near the part where it bend.

"Hold on,there's a chipped off piece here."Kyle said.

"Don't touch it!It's the trigger!"Kyle backed his hand away,when Yemen said that.Good thing she did,because he would have gotten his head blown off.

"Now that you have a weapon,let's get going!"Shelly yelled with excitement,as she grabbed Kyle by his shirt,and dragged him along with her on the ground.

And so,Kyle,Shelly,and Yemen,set out on a quest to find the bandit,and clear his name.

"You know...his hiding spot isn't far from here."Shelly said.

Oh...then never mind about the quest thing.
1133111.title: Continue...

choices: Yes, you're going to help Laharl whether you like it or not
Even MORE untold stories!? part two
11333.content: Did Laharl summon you to handle the Female demons in his castle because it is mating season? While most would think he'd be more than happy to handle it himself, his weakness is happy, peaceful sayings and sexy bodies. Chances are that he'd freak out if someone tried to flirt with him.
11333.title: being called to help?

choices: Tell the brat where to stick that offer!
113331.content:
As the ache in your head dies down, memories come back to you. Memories of the war between the humans and the Demons of the Netherworld. You were one of the human resistance's finest soldiers. A star pupil of one of the greatest Demon Hunting agencies in the world, you were a hell of a weapon against the hellish oppressors! Heck, that rock you mistook for a fridge was your patented Lucky Rock which you used to bludgeon the dreaded Maderas to death at the Battle of New Hope City. That's right, you killed a vampire general by beating his friggin head in with a rock until he stopped moving! It was epic! Shame it was the ROCK that got a medal. (The human resistance made a great enlistment campaign after it: 'LET'S ROCK THEIR NETHERWORLD! JOIN THE RESISTANCE TODAY!')

Everything after that's a blur. Er... train ride... explosion... drunken gypsy... tentacles.... 40HL. Next thing you knew, here you are. In the middle of a dark, gloomy, creepy wasteland. No humans in sight. Just eerie glowing eyes surrounding you, glaring your direction.
"Aw... crap," you whispered to yourself as you attempting to reach for a bottle of booze in your fridge and remembering last minute it's STILL a rock! A whoop-ass rock, but a rock nonethless! So the Netherworld demons finally caught up to you. You took a deep breath and made a silent prayer in your head, ready to go down fighting with your bare fists!

"DOOD! CHECK IT OUT!" you heard a high pitch shout of excitement from one of the silhouettes, "IT'S THE SMASHER!!"
"Smasher?" you silently muttered to yourself.
"The Smasher?! No way, dood!" a similar high-pitch voice replied, "THE Smasher?! The same Smasher that jumped off the roof of a 10 story burning building to deliver a dropkick to Hoggmeiser on the ground floor?!"
"The same Smasher dood that jumped into a lake of man-eating piranhas and communicated with them the order to sink serpent battleships?!"
"The very same Smasher that singlehandedly defeated a Majin in hand-to-hand combat by kicking him in the balls so hard, his head exploded?! Dood!!"
"The same Smasher that swallowed a dragon?!"
"The one Smasher that can talk to the dead... and teach them broadway musicals?!"
"The Smasher guy that if you spell his real name backwards, he rips your eyes out and mails them to your mom?!"

Wow... you were aware there's a lot of rumors going on about you but GEEZ!!

"The very same..." said a much older, more sophisticated male's voice coming from the much taller silhouette. The moon shined bright, lighting up the shadows. You found yourself surrounded by those godawful stupid jihadist stitched penguins!
"Prinnies..." you gritted your teeth at the name of those abominations! You were sickened by these things! For all you know, those could be the souls of your fallen friends and comrades that have been corrupted and reduced to these shells by the damn Overlords! With them stood a tall robed figure in a dark cloak and garb covering all but his glowing yellow eyes and abnormally long gray untrimmed fingers and thumbs.
"Mr. Smasher," the sophisticated robed gentlemen spoke, "my master requires your presence immediately."
"He says the boss wants to see ya, dood!" one of the prinnies 'translated'!
"Will you sign my rock, dood?!" another prinny handed you his rock. You groaned, but signed the thing.

*Boom!!!* Suddenly thunder struck and lightning flashed!
"AAAAAAAAAAAAAAahahahahahaha!!!" on cue with the equally thunderous evil little boy laugh! "one of the weakling mortals' greatest warriors... right here in my domain! Move aside, lackies!"
The robed gentleman and a few prinnies moved aside and gave room for the Big Bad... er... Small Bad blue haired shirtless brat Overlord himself! You recognize this guy from all the propaganda posters! The two antennae-like hair strands and red scarf gave this particular Overlord away!

"LAHARL!!" just saying his name struck fear in your soul! His dominating aura was just as overwhelming as you imagined it... although you never thought he was THIS puny in real life!

His red eyes stared deep into yours as he approached you with a menacing grin. "The one and only! And you must be the great Smasher himself! One of the other bugs from the lame mortal resistance that's actually giving me a CHALLENGE!"
"And he brought with him his Lucky Rock, my lord," the robed man quipped.

"Well! Guess we can say his just luck run out! ....LAUGH!!" Laharl demanded. The rest of his prinny crew started chuckling or pretended to.
"Hahah...uh... good one, dood!"
"Yes, very amusing indeed, my lord."

Personally, you thought 'Rock Their Netherworld' was funnier. But now was not the time for jokes.

"Whatever you plan to do to me," you looked down at the twerp lord, "make it quick!"
"He is as brave as he is rumored to be," the robed man commented.
Laharl snickered, "He certainly is, Nic! He'll make a great tool!" Tool?!

You had no idea what he meant by 'tool'. Well, technically you DID because of the choice you selected for this chapter, but anyways!

"Normally, I could just simply kill you here and now," Laharl warned you, "preferably bash your head in with a rock like ya did good ol' Maderas, then pour whatever's left of your unspilled brains into a prinny skull!"
The prinnies got all excited from hearing that!
"Ya hear that dood?! One of us is gonna get Smasher brains!"
"I hope it's me! I wanna rip an angel's wings off and fly over Los Angeles with them, too!"

A quick glare from Laharl made the penguins shut up.
"...However," he spoke, "it'd be an awful waste of perfectly good potential! I've got a particular job position that requires YOUR special abilities with your name on it!"
You squinted your eyes off him, ready to snub off his job offer. "I'd sooner die than be a servant of the likes of YOU!"

"Watch your tongue, lad," the robed gentleman warned, "less you want it ripped from your jaw."
"It's alright, Nic," Laharl wasnt offended, "actually, I wasnt asking you to be a servant. This er... particular I have in mind is something the rest of your worthless kind can only DREAM of!"

"Really, now?" you played alone.
Laharl nodded, "You see... my girl subordinates are a real fickle bunch. Especially around this time of year. You see, unlike the guys, their behaviors are pretty hostile, primitive, and especially unruly. When theyre not given the proper satisfaction to certain desires, they make for an unorganized group. And an unorganized group means an unorganized army. And an unorganized army means a WEAK army!"
"I'm not sure I follow."
"You see," Nic tries to explain, "the females of this season tend to be what you humans call 'in heat'. The peak of potential reproduction. What my lord seeks is a proper designated stallion for his female soldiers to nourish themselves with to sate their primordial urges."
You blinked at Nic's philosophical explanation.
"He wants ya to bow-chika-wow-wow 'em, dood!"

Your eyes widened and your jaw dropped! "YOU... YOU WANT ME TO BE A SEX-SLAVE TO YOUR DEMONS?!" How disgusting! Tempting, but disgusting! The Smasher himself reduced to siring his enemies' hellspawn?!
"Youre a great warrior! You should be honored to have this opportunity!" Laharl commented, "And with you ka-boinking my minions, not only will they continue fighting strong, but with your strong genes, you'll provide me with future top-class soliders to add to the army! HAHAHAHAHAHAAA!!!"
"...But... in that case. Youre a high-ranked Overlord," you remarked, "why couldnt YOU just fuck 'em?"
Laharl suddenly stopped laughing and got a little nervous... "Uh... well... um that is..." his face got red and started sweating, "normally I would, but you see..."
"My lord sadly has no time for such matters," Nic covered for him, "he is far too busy planning his next steps toward victory to do so."
"But I thought you said it's cuz boobies scare hi-BOOOOOM!!!" the prinny suddenly exploded before he could finish! Nic wiped off the excess dead prinny off his cloak.

Laharl gritted his teeth, "Grr... and as you can see, the males I already got arent of much use! Now enough chat! Will you accept my generous job offer? Or would you rather die a slow, horrible, agonizing death?!"

You heard the brat. Will you agree to be a sex-slave to his female demon minions?! Or will the great Smasher go down fighting?!
113331.title: Let's Rock their Netherworld!

1133312.content:
"I refuse. You can take that deal and-" you said, before Laharl rushed over to you and slugged you in the stomach, knocking the wind out of you. You fell to your knees, gasping for breath.

"Feh. While I like your bravado, you have more important business with my female troops." Laharl said.

You tried to say something, but could only wheeze in response.

"Y'see... Had you accepted, You would have been extracted every so often for food and rest." Laharl said,while walking around you.

"But you chose to refuse..." Nic continued. "So you will get left entirely to the whims of sex-crazed demonesses. I doubt they'll allow you to eat or sleep."

"DEATH BY SNU-SNU!!!" A group of Prinnies cheerfully shouted.

"Huh?" Laharl asked, looking at Nic for an explanation.

"It's a term from some show from Earth. It means Death by sex." Nic said.

"Oh.. I mean- I knew that, I just wanted to make sure that you did as well." Laharl said, a bit flustered.

"Of course, my lord." Nic said, while nodding.

By now, you had regained some breath in your lungs. But before you could do anything, Nic pointed his hand at you and you were teleported to somewhere else in the castle.

---

When you came to, you heard the echoes of giggling. After a few seconds of listening to them, you realized that the giggles were getting closer by the second.

Then you heard something that outright terrified you.

"Lookie here, girls! The Prince gave us a present!" Etna's voice said.

"Is it some Prism Ranger DVD?" Flonne's voice asked.

"Nope. Something even better...." Etna's voice replied.
1133312.title: forced to do it anyways.

11333121.content:
It was too late for you to run. Even if you could run, you wouldnt be able to escape Laharl's domain. From what one of your old mentor's told you, Laharl's domain consists of hundreds of cutthroat soldiers, thousands of suicide-ready prinnies, tens of thousands of well-laid traps, dozens of High ranked hell hounds, a bunch of gigantic Killer penguin-robots, and even after getting through all THAT, you still have to search high and low for a portal leading back to the human world! The Smasher did a lot of incredible death-defying things in his life, but escaping Hell was not one of them.

So without much option, you took a deep breath and stood your ground, showing and smelling no fear.

But fear smelled like WAY too much perfume! You opened your eyes again and found yourself gazing inches away into a pair of beaming blood-red eyes as they squinted into a smirking expression!

"Well, howdy-do!" the red haired scantily clad imp standing before you chimed. You held back the desire to gasp in the horror that was Etna, the uber-ungodly powerful prima donna demoness your mentors warned you about! Despite making you giggle at the thought that this twerp calls herself a 'Beauty Queen', the stories told about her were nothing to laugh about. Her strength could possibly overpower Laharl's. And she was right here! In your face!
"*GASP!* TH-TH-TH-THE SMASHER HIMSELF?!" squeaked the high-pitched squeal of the blonde red-eyed red ribboned angel in red! FALLEN angel! The very angel that made you lose faith and hope in the angels themselves! If even a pure honest-to-goodness angel can become corrupted, the only ally the humans can rely on are themselves! "The REAL Smasher?! It's not another bootleg copy, is it? Like that copy of 'A Tales of Nine Tails' Season 6 you got me for my birthday?"
"Nope! This is the real deal!" Etna answered, still beaming with excitement, "I recognize that face from the news report regarding New Hope!"

"Wow! Mr. Laharl gave us one of the human's Heroes!" Flonne bowed, "it's... it's an honor to torture you, sir!" For her to say that so polite made you cringe!
"Uh uh uh!" Etna waved her finger, "no torturing yet. This guy's got a big job to do!"
"Really?" Flonnes eyes widened innocently, "what kind of job?"
"Why makin' us babies, of course!"
"Babies?!! I'M... I'm gonna be a mommy? The Smasher is gonna make me a mommy?" it almost tugged your heart strings to hear Flonne so excited to hear such news. ALMOST. "W...Wow. I'm so excited! Wh...what should I name our child?! Smashling? Smashette? Smasherella? Flonne Jr.?"
'How bout Stillbirth #71930?' you thought to yourself.

"Whoa! Cool your jets, Flonny!" Etna said, "you can worry about that when it's YOUR turn! After all, Laharl said we ALL get a round! So, Flonny-Baby! What time is it?"
"Um... a quarter after midnight?"
"Nope! Ladies..." a microphone magically appeared in her hand as Etna turned her head to the darkness... you sensed a LOOOOOOOOOOOOOOT of bad vibes coming from that direction, "what time is it?!"

"IT'S RAPE TIME!!" roared a tremendous crowd of strong, ovulating demonesses! Oh, Hell's Belles...

Suddenly, the bright flashy lights suddenly come on and you hear what you assume is the theme from Wheel of Fortune playing on the speakers! You found yourself in the middle of what looked to be a game show!! The loud lively audience that could barely remain sitting down all consisted of women. DEMON women! There was a wide variety of demons, too! You saw vampires, nekomata, plant girls, pink prinnies, succubi, beastmasters, ronins, kunoichis, mages, what you assumed were girl dragons, the friggin works! You probably broke the neck of at least one demon of each kind you saw in that audience.

"That's right ladies!" you heard the lady announcer, "Live from the darkest deepest region of Overlord Laharl's manor for the first time ever... It's time to play 'It's Rape Time'! And here's your host... BEAUTY QUEEN ETNA!!"

The crowd cheered as you did a double take when Etna magically changed into a red sparkly dress in the blink of an eye! She waved at the crowd and even blew a few kisses. What in the heck have you gotten yourself into?

"Thank you! Thank you!" Etna spoke up as the crowd's applause died down, "now... as we all know, being underpaid overqualified minions for smarmy high-and-mighty brats is hard work. I mean, you work your fingers to the bone fighting, blowing up stuff, ripping organs out, increasing the orphan population of our enemies... all this while trying DESPERATELY not to break a nail! You get what I'm saying, girls?"
*ramble ramble ramble* the audience seemingly agreed.

"Yes yes, and after doing this for SO many decades, dont you just wish you can finally get a break? I mean, not just a day off, but a REAL reward?! A suitable reward that can just take all that rage out on and finally relieve that incredible amount of stress we've been building up?"
*ramble ramble* the audience agreed again. Youre still shaking your head in shame of what's about to come!
"Well today's our lucky day, gals!" Etna announced, "because with us right now is that stress relief in the form of a puny human! But not just ANY puny human! No siree! Pandora, introduce our special guest!"

Major spotlights lit your puny body up for all to see! You could feel the glowing eyes of every she-beast in the audience gazing into you!
"Hailing from the corners of Mason Hawk, Florida of the human world," the announcer spoke, "of the human resistance's finest soldiers! The Legendary hero that spent the last few years devouring troops of the Netherworld like Pez, striking fears in the hearts of monsters a hundred times his size! Current bounty of 786,000,000HL! His turn-ons include fighting for silly justice the ridiculous idea of freedom for his fellow race! He enjoys walks on the beach and using Axel's carcass as a surfboard. SAY HELLO TO THE ONE... THE ONLY... SMASHER!!!"

You covered your ears and the thunderous roaring and applause you got from those things! They were thrilled to have someone like you as their personal 'stress-relief'! You felt sickened that you were actually a teeny bit tempted to be their plaything! You forced yourself to remember what they did to your comrades to keep your will strong. Unfortunately, for the time being, there was no escape.

"Isnt he just a dream boat, ladies?" you gritted your teeth as Etna stroked your cheek, "he's like a big cute cuddly tiger that wants to rip your face off, but cant cuz he's declawed and defanged! So Mr. Smasher, tell us in your own words... how's it feel to be the Bitch?" She put her mic to your mouth.
You stood your ground and replied, "To be honest, I'm looking forward to YOU especially!"
Etna raised an eyebrow and grinned, "Oh?"
"Yep," you smirked, "I could use a good FLAT surface to iron my shirt!" ZING!

The crowd broke out in a fit of laughter at the flat-chested imp's expense! Etna's eyebrow twitched as Flonne whispered, "Dont worry, Etna! Some boys happened to like the petite frame!"

"VERY good joke!" Etna had a forced smirk, "I'll be sure to remember it when it's MY turn! *Ahem!* Anyways, each girl in the audience will get a whole 20 minutes alone with Smasher to fulfill your wildest desire!" TWENTY MINUTES?! WITH EVERYBODY IN THAT AUDIENCE?!! "However, the order of which girl gets him will be decided by pure lottery!"
Two succubi drag out a raffle cage with pieces of paper inside!
"I have each person's name in this raffle cage," Etna explained, "for every 20 minute session, I'll draw a name! Whoever gets called, gets their fun! Who'll get first go... and who'll end up with sloppy seconds?! Will an alraune get fertilized? Will a nekomata bag herself a nice live scratching post? Will a kunoichi discover just how many pressure points a human has?"

You swallowed hard, waiting in fear and anticipation as a succubus turned the crank of the raffle cage, mixing up those names real good.

"The suspense is just KILLING me!" Etna kept staring at you with a glittering grin as she pulled out a piece of paper.

"And Lucky Gal #1 is...."
11333121.title: Does everybody know what time it is?!

choices: The potion healed you, but you quickly learned it was also an aphrodisiac
113331211.content:
"ME!!!" Etna cheered, waving the paper around after she read it.

"Wait a second! Is this another one of your tricks?" Flonne asked, pouting cutely. You got the feeling that if Flonne was the one that won the lottery, you could have talked her into letting you go.

Etna then put her arm around Flonne's neck and whispered "Trust me, I'm not playing a prank. Not when there are a thousand psychos ready to tear me apart for a guy."

She then released Flonne and faced you.

"I'd like a bit of privacy for my time. Sorry, Girls!" Etna said as she grabbed you by the shirt collar and teleported to a bedroom. You could have sword the crown groaned in disappointment.

The room had a large bed. a couple of dressers, and a window that had bars on the outside.

Seeing your chance, you decided to punch Etna in the stomach and escape. Right before your punch connected, you saw an evil smirk form on Etna's face.

You soon realized why she was smirking. When you hit her, you were the one that got hurt! It was like she was a brick wall and you were an egg!

As you held your hurting fist, Etna sighed.

"Honestly, I thought the Smasher would be stronger then this..." Etna muttered. "Then again, you've been fighting the scraps of this Netherworld."

"What are you saying?" you asked, not liking what she said. You were cradling your hurting hand.

"I'm saying that you're roughly about lv. 80, and that I'm lv. 1000. You couldn't beat me even in your dreams." Etna asked, now sitting on the bed. She then asked, "Do you know a General Carter?"

"Yeah, you demons murdered him at the EDF Headquarters!" you yelled.

"That's because he tried picking a fight with the Prince, but was unwilling to fight Laharl face to face." Etna said. "Carter claimed he wanted the resources of the Netherworld to deal with the problem of overpopulation or something."

"You could have helped us instead of fighting us!" you yelled.

"We could have, if you asked in the first place. Instead, you humans woke up the conquering streak in the Prince. He's just sending the weaklings to Earth to let you guys grow stronger before he gets serious about the whole invasion thing." Etha replied, as she got up to grab a potion out of a dresser. "Need a healing potion? It'll fix what ails ya."

You glared at her. She smiled back, in a way that let you know that she had full control of the situation.

14.content:
You wake and shake you head slowly. "Oh dood, that was some party last night. Wait... What did I just say? Dood? Why did I say that..."

It was then our hero looked down and saw they were now a Prinny. A Prinny is a penguin demon who is typically what a human soul gets turned into. Peg leg feet, a sack with some swords and bombs. Prinnies get no respect in the demon world, oh, and they explode when thrown.

"Wait, what!?! I explode when thrown!?! DOOD!"

Yes hero, you explode when thrown. Best do what anyone asks of you, less you want to end this story quickly.

"Oh dood... this isn't fun... Alright, well I guess... I better find something to do? Right, dood?"

Exactly. And thus our hero begins their journey in the Neitherworld.
14.title: A Prinny?

choices: To take your prinny skin, DOOD!
141.content:
You look around the rather desolate landscape of the netherworld, finding great joy when you say prinnies like yourself.

“Hey DOODs! I just got here! Can anyone help a prinny who doesn’t know what to do!”, you yelled as you ran towards them awkwardly with your stubby makeshift legs but fell halfway.

The 5 Prinnies turn and stared at you for a sec before one with out a belt then turns to the other and says, “See DOOD, what did I tell you. I told you it would come to us. Now you owe me five bucks.”

“Wha- You were looking for me, DOODs?”, you squawked in surprise as you balance yourself on your pegs.

A prinny with a scar on its head answers with a gruff but nonetheless high voice, ”Yeah, we were sent to look for you…”
141.title: The hero finds a bunch of prinnies in the dista...

1411.content:
So the group of prinnies cluster around you and shuffle you off. Most of the tour you dont even comprehend because all the prinnies are talking at once, some of them not even about what they're showing you. Soon though, you find yourself being shuffled in through a massive gate. You manage to catch one of the prinnies saying something about the Overlords Castle and assume that's where you are. You walk with the other prinnies along vast corridors, they're still all chattering away, some of them pointing at various things, some of them just jabbering about the weather. You travel down several flights of steps until, very suddenly, all the prinnies become very quiet. The all begin to move faster and try to shove you along, and you notice they are trying to pass a door as fast as they can. You begin to get frustrated with all the babbling and scream.
"Will you shut up DOODs! Whats the deal?" All five of the prinnies flatten up against the wall in front of you.
"DOOD, thats Lady Etna's room!" One whispers.
"She'll kill us if we wake her up DOOD!"
Suddenly there is a large crash...
"Oh crap..." The prinnies scatter down the halls, two of them smacking into each other and collapsing.
The door flings open behind you, nearly flying off the hinges.
"Okay! Who do I have to KILL to stop ALL THE NOISE!!??" Etna roared, brandishing her spear. She jabs you in the neck and forces you against the wall. "Is it you pipsqueak?"
1411.title: The Grand Tour.

14112.content:
"It was the other prinnies DOOD! They were yelling and making noise to wake you up and then they were gonna blame me for it. That's why they ran!" You blurt it out as fast as you can and then cower, closing your eyes tight, not expecting Etna to believe a word of it. But after a few seconds, you open one eye slowly to see Etna only an inch from your face, staring at you.
"Your voice, its different from the others, who are you?" The rage has left her voice but shes still holding the spear to your neck.
"I..I'm new, I cant really remember how I got here but I woke up like this DOOD." You cower again, but Etna puts her finger under your chin and pulls your face forward. She stares into your eyes intensely for a moment, the look burning through the back of your head. Then she laughs and stands, bringing her boot down on you head.
"All right prinny, I'm feeling generous today so maybe you'll just get a light beating, but go get those other prinnies and bring 'em back here. They need a reminder not to disobey me." She lifts her boot and squats down in front of you. "In fact, if you do it quick, there might be a little reward for you." You look at her, confused. She grins and flips her skirt up, showing you her bare pussy. You swallow hard, blushing bright red, and point to the two prinnies who hit each other trying to run.
"Th..those two right there.. they're part of it." Etna stands pulling her skirt down, and chucks the massive spear, goring to two prinnies on the ground. She skips over and retrieves her spear, then skips back to her room. As shes closing her door she turns to you and winks.
You stand in the hallway for a few minutes, frozen by a mixture of fear, confusion, and lust. She was offering herself to you, but was she serious? She seemed like she might run you through with the spear rather than keep her word. Nevertheless, she at least might NOT kill you if you found the other prinnies. You run down the hall, following the path of the other prinnies. You find a staircase at the end that leads down. You follow it down four flight until you can hear voices. Its them, you're sure of it. You throw open the door and see four hundred prinnies milling about.
How the hell are you going to find them in this!?
14112.title: Passing the buck

choices: Though human, you'll still need to work as a prinny.
For the rare human form, you're promoted by an overlord.
A high level demon shows up to greet you, but who?
1412.content:
"WHAT!!!", you squawked in surpise, "Take my prinny skin? But why, DOOD?!"

          The high-pitch but gruff voiced prinny puffs up its chest and answers as he pulls out a large knife from his bag, "We're short on prinny skins for the newcomers and of all the recent prinnies, you're sin is minor compared to someone who really deserves it, DOOD. Now hold still so I can cut you, DOOD."

          You covered your eyes and cringe to the pain you knew you had coming, but a moment passed and nothing happens, at least as far as you knew. You could hear the gruff penguin laugh and you open your eyes to see the first prinny presenting you with a cap that looks like a prinny face. Confused but nervous, you reach out and take it, though quickly dropping it in astonishment when your own human hands came into view. Looking yourself over, you found that you were no longer a prinny anymore, but yourself wearing a outfit with colors resembling that of a prinny.

          You turn to see the gruff but high-pitched voiced penguin as he laughs, swinging what looks to be a deflated prinny over his shoulder and sneers as he broke the silence, "Now, that didn't hurt, now did it. Heh, the newcomer's reactions never get old...", before turning around and heading off into the wasteland.
1412.title: To take your prinny skin, DOOD!

info.brief_description: In the Netherworld there are untold tales, and you get to experience some.
info.description:
You were a human, living your everyday life, but now you wake up and find yourself in the Netherworld. Who has brought you here? What is your purpose here? What are you going to do?!? Explore the lands and interact with Demons. But be careful, you might just go and get yourself killed...

Taking the aspects of the game Disgaea. Explore, have fun, go into a fetish. Who knows what might happen.

The only things not allowed:
-Fattening a character (sorry, but I see way too many of these stories and they don't interest me in any way)
-Bad grammar, I will try to fix/edit the best I can.
-Chapters with a single choice of how to continue.

Nope, that is about it... You can die in this, demons can just reincarnate. May add more rules if they seem prevalent or needed.
Note: Narrations will be in bold. And yes, Disgaea is famous for some silly features to it. So feel free to have characters able to listen to the narration.
